mainText:
Thank you. Your creativity has made it possible for me, as a musician 
and composer, to realize my dreams - from first recording music in my 
bedroom, to creating music for feature films and tv shows, your machines 
have changed my life and made the impossible possible. I can sincerely 
say that every piece of music and art I've made in the last 15 years has 
happened with the help of the tools you innovated.

Thank you for everything.
author: Ego
